attributes.action: Stock the river with fish in Banbridge NI and cut down all overgrown trees
attributes.additional_details: As many people can see the river bann in Banbridge is bad for fishing everything is overgrown and the river is not stocked which is disappointing for fishermen
attributes.background: Hi all I think the river bann in Banbridge should be stocked with fish and all overgrown trees and plants should be cut as what is the point of fishermen paying licenses for bad fishing conditions?

rejection.details:
This would be the responsibility of the Northern Ireland Executive or your local authority.

You can find more information here:

https://www.nidirect.gov.uk/information-and-services/outdoor-recreation-and-sport/angling
